name: LearningCounts.org
description: LearningCounts.org serves as a comprehensive Prior Learning Assessment (PLA) resource to adult learners, postsecondary institutions, employers and workforce organizations. PLA is the evaluation and assessment of an individual’s lifelong learning for college credit leading to degree completion, certification, or professional development. This lifelong learning may be acquired through work, employer training programs, military service, independent study, non-credit courses, volunteer or community service, and open source courseware.
